title: Hey y'all! I just joined PES EEE branch? Can I anyone give me an insight into what I can expect in the next 4 years? What's the upsides and what's the downsides?

comments.body: well first year is by s&h department, so next three years will be under ee department. Don't want to scare you, but don't get your hopes up. Ee department is decent, but not upto the mark unlike cse or ec. Also depends on how you gonna plan out your future.
I'm also in EEE dude, we'll get through this together ü§ù
How's is EEE going for yo
I'm a fresher, so for now it's chill, scared for the second year tho , Everybody says it gets a lot harder :/
same here fresher as well, in EEE
hey I'm in 2nd year now..how is it going so far?
im considering PES EEE branch. can u tell me if it is worth it??
